## Cisco-IOS-XR-fib-common-oper.yang

- [XPaths Obsoleted](#xpaths-obsoleted)

- [XPaths Removed](#xpaths-removed)
- [XPaths Modified](#xpaths-modified)

### Description

list 'locator' and leaf 'locator-count' are removed due to deprecation.

## XPaths Obsoleted

N/A

## XPaths Deprecated

N/A

## XPaths Added

N/A
